sentences.en: " Francesca , give me the camera with the blue strap, please. "
sentences.cn: “ 弗朗西丝卡, 请递给我那架有蓝背带的相机. ”

sentences.en: A watch strap holds a watch on your wrist.
sentences.cn: 表带把手表系在手腕上.

sentences.en: As darkness comes you strap up your basket and drive happily home.
sentences.cn: 当黄昏降临时,你系好篮子,快乐地驾车回家.

sentences.en: Climbers can strap sharp nails on to help get a foothold on a slippery slope.
sentences.cn: 登山运动员可以在靴子上捆上尖钉,这样有助于在很滑的陡坡上站住脚.

sentences.en: Experienced travelers strap in without waiting to be asked.
sentences.cn: 有经验的旅客一就座便自动系好安全带.

sentences.en: Hang on to the strap. The bus is starting.
sentences.cn: 抓住皮带, 汽车要开动了.

sentences.en: I need a new watch strap.
Nancy gripped the strap of her beach bag.
sentences.cn: 南希抓住了自己沙滩包的带子。

sentences.en: She held onto a strap to steady herself.
sentences.cn: 她抓住拉手吊带以便站稳.

sentences.en: She pulled the strap of her nightgown onto her shoulder.
sentences.cn: 她将自己睡袍的吊带拉到肩膀上。

sentences.en: She stared at the floor, idly playing with the strap of her handbag.
sentences.cn: 她眼睛盯着地板，漫不经心地摆弄着手提包的带子。

sentences.en: She strapped the baby seat into the car.
sentences.cn: 她把婴儿座椅用带子绑在那辆汽车上。

sentences.en: soldiers with grenades strapped to their belts
sentences.cn: 腰带上绑着手榴弹的士兵

sentences.en: The strap is too loose. Tighten it up a bit.
sentences.cn: 带子太松了, 再勒一勒.

sentences.en: The strap of my bag is broken.
Through the basement window I saw him strap on his pink cycling helmet.
sentences.cn: 透过地下室的窗户，我看到他正在把他那粉色的自行车头盔系在头上。

sentences.en: Wordlessly I bared my back and he lashed me with a strap.
sentences.cn: 我二话没说脱掉上衣,他用皮带抽打我的背.

words.tran_cn: 无带的；无背带的；无肩带的
用皮绳捆的人；马夫；用磨刀皮带磨的人；体格结实而健壮的人
鞭打；皮带材料；裹伤胶带
用带捆扎；约束，束缚（strap的现在分词）

trans.tran_cn: 带子，皮带，磨刀皮带，鞭打
trans.tran_en: a narrow band of strong material that is used to fasten, hang, or hold onto something

trans.tran_cn: 用带捆扎，用皮带抽打，拼命工作
trans.tran_en: to fasten something or someone in place with one or more straps
If you strap something somewhere, you fasten it there with a strap
